title: Belt Buckle, 1904–08
markings: Marks: Stamped on back of silver frame: "826 S GJ [monogram] G.J." See GEORG JENSEN SILVERSMITH; 77 ARTISTS, 75 YEARS (Washington, DC: Smithsonian In- stitution Press, 1980), p.126.
creditline: Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund
description: Large oval green agate center, surrounded by 12 smaller agates and 8 amber cabochons, all set in silver frame with leaf-like embossed designs. Safety clasp on reverse.

tombstone.epitaph:
Belt Buckle, 1904–08.
1904–08. Silver, agate, amber. Museum purchase from Decorative Arts Association Acquisition Fund. 1989-98-2-a,b.
